projects.title: Medical Chatbot
projects.bodyText:
- Built an end-to-end AI medical question-answering system over long-form clinical content.
- Implemented a **RAG** pipeline with **Pinecone** for context-aware retrieval.
- Automated deployment using **Docker**, **GitHub Actions**, and **AWS**.

projects.title: Twitter Hate Speech Detection
projects.bodyText:
- Built an RNN-based hate speech classifier with **93.8%** validation accuracy and **91%** recall on **56,745** tweets.
- Designed a custom NLP tokenizer with 50K vocabulary and sequence padding for model training.
- Trained a 5.1M-parameter LSTM with PyTorch Lightning and deployed with CI/CD on AWS.

projects.title: Identifying Question Pairs with Similar Intent
projects.bodyText:
- Built a semantic duplicate-question detection model using Random Forest and Gaussian Naive Bayes.
- Achieved **75%** accuracy and **60%** recall with TF-IDF features and text preprocessing pipeline.
- Deployed the model with **Streamlit** for interactive real-time inference.

projects.title: Publication: Generative Models as Surrogates for Global SST
projects.bodyText:
- Comparative study of **GAN**, **VAE**, and **DDPM** for Earth-system surrogate modeling.
- Focused on long-horizon global SST simulation using CMIP6 GISS data.
- Status: **Under Review** (July 2025).
